problem_names:
lemmas TESL_interp_aci = TESL_interp_commute
                         TESL_interp_assoc
                         TESL_interp_left_commute
                         TESL_interp_left_idem
translations: text \<open>Similar to the expansion laws of lattices.\<close>
section \<open>Equational laws for the denotation of TESL formulae\<close>

lemmas TESL_interp_aci = TESL_interp_commute
                         TESL_interp_assoc
                         TESL_interp_left_commute
                         TESL_interp_left_idem
text \<open>The empty formula is the identity element.\<close>

text\<open>
  Adding constraints to a TESL formula reduces the number of satisfying runs.
\<close>

text \<open>
  Repeating a formula in a specification does not change the specification.
\<close>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<phi> #
                     \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> [\<phi>] \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L \<inter>
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<phi> \<in> set \<Phi>
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set ?\<Phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<phi> #
                       \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

text \<open>
  Removing duplicate formulae in a specification does not change the specification.
\<close>

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> [] \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                        [] \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
 2. \<And>a \<Phi>.
       \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
       \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                           \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L \<Longrightarrow>
       \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> a #
                          \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
       \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                           (a #
                            \<Phi>) \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>_ \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                      \<Phi>_ \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> [] \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                        [] \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
 2. \<And>a \<Phi>.
       \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
       \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                           \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L \<Longrightarrow>
       \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> a #
                          \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
       \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                           (a #
                            \<Phi>) \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>_ \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                      \<Phi>_ \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> a_ #
                       \<Phi>_ \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                        (a_ #
                         \<Phi>_) \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>_ \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                      \<Phi>_ \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  ?\<phi> \<in> set ?\<Phi> \<Longrightarrow>
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<phi> #
                     ?\<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> a_ #
                       \<Phi>_ \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                        (a_ #
                         \<Phi>_) \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> a_ #
                     \<Phi>_ \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                      (a_ #
                       \<Phi>_) \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> [] \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                        [] \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

text \<open>
  Specifications that contain the same formulae have the same semantics.
\<close>

proof (state)
this:
  set (remdups \<Phi>) = set (remdups \<Phi>')

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (state)
this:
  set (remdups \<Phi>) = set (remdups \<Phi>')

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (state)
this:
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>) =
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>')

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (chain)
picking this:
  set (remdups \<Phi>) = set (remdups \<Phi>')
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>) =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>') =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>) =
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>')

proof (prove)
using this:
  set (remdups \<Phi>) = set (remdups \<Phi>')
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>) =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>') =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>) =
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>')

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (prove)
using this:
  set (remdups \<Phi>) = set (remdups \<Phi>')
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>) =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>') =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>) =
  \<Inter> (TESL_interpretation_atomic ` set \<Phi>')
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> remdups
                      ?\<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

text \<open>
  The semantics of specifications is contravariant with respect to their inclusion.
\<close>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>\<Phi>\<^sub>r.
        set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>' \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  set \<Phi> \<subseteq> set \<Phi>'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>\<Phi>\<^sub>r.
        set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>' \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
    \<subseteq> \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (prove)
using this:
  set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>'

proof (prove)
using this:
  set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>'
  set \<Phi> \<subseteq> set \<Phi>'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>'

proof (state)
this:
  set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
    \<subseteq> \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (state)
this:
  set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
    \<subseteq> \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set \<Phi> \<union> set \<Phi>\<^sub>r = set \<Phi>'

proof (prove)
using this:
  set \<Phi> \<subseteq> set \<Phi>'
  set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set \<Phi> \<union> set \<Phi>\<^sub>r = set \<Phi>'

proof (state)
this:
  set \<Phi> \<union> set \<Phi>\<^sub>r = set \<Phi>'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
    \<subseteq> \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (state)
this:
  set \<Phi> \<union> set \<Phi>\<^sub>r = set \<Phi>'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
    \<subseteq> \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (prove)
using this:
  set ?\<Phi> = set ?\<Phi>' \<Longrightarrow>
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> @
                       \<Phi>\<^sub>r \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (chain)
picking this:
  set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>'
  set \<Phi> \<union> set \<Phi>\<^sub>r = set \<Phi>'
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> @
                     \<Phi>\<^sub>r \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> @
                     \<Phi>\<^sub>r \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L \<inter>
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>\<^sub>r \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L \<inter>
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>\<^sub>r \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<subseteq> \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (prove)
using this:
  set (\<Phi> @ \<Phi>\<^sub>r) = set \<Phi>'
  set \<Phi> \<union> set \<Phi>\<^sub>r = set \<Phi>'
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> @
                     \<Phi>\<^sub>r \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> @
                     \<Phi>\<^sub>r \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L \<inter>
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>\<^sub>r \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L \<inter>
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>\<^sub>r \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<subseteq> \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
    \<subseteq> \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (prove)
using this:
  set \<Phi> \<subseteq> set \<Phi>'
  set ?\<Phi> \<subseteq> set ?\<Phi>' \<Longrightarrow>
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<subseteq> \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<phi> #
                       \<Phi>' \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
    \<subseteq> \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<phi> #
                                   \<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

by (simp add: Int_absorb1 TESL_interp_decreases_setinc
                          TESL_interp_homo_append assms)

proof (prove)
using this:
  set ?\<Phi>\<^sub>1 \<subseteq> set ?\<Phi>\<^sub>2 \<Longrightarrow>
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<Phi>\<^sub>1 @
                     ?\<Phi>\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<Phi>\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<Phi>\<^sub>1 @
                     ?\<Phi>\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<Phi>\<^sub>2 @
                     ?\<Phi>\<^sub>1 \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
  set \<Phi>\<^sub>2 \<subseteq> set \<Phi>\<^sub>1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>\<^sub>1 @
                       \<Phi>\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L =
    \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> \<Phi>\<^sub>1 \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L

proof (prove)
using this:
  set (filter ?P ?xs) \<subseteq> set ?xs

this:

using this:
  \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk> ?\<Phi> \<rbrakk>\<rbrakk>\<^sub>T\<^sub>E\<^sub>S\<^sub>L
